ygData.subject: Re: Mid-range hunting grounds...
ygData.msgSnippet: Best place for wisps are at Eruds Crossing.  There are a couple of spawning points on the island and if that is taken Zombie sailors are there for the taking.
ygData.messageBody:
Best place for wisps are at Eruds Crossing. There are a couple of
spawning points on the island and if that is taken Zombie sailors are
there for the taking. They give excellent loot to from rawhide armor
to bronze weapons.
--- James Galbraith <James@...> wrote:
> From: James Galbraith <James@...>
>
> Hello fellow clerics:
>
> I have a lvl 12 dwarven cleric on Tarrew Mar and am
> wondering where some
> good hunting grounds are for the mid-levels. I've
> been trying to hunt down
> wisps, but I can't find a reasonable concentration
> of them. Is there a
> place that's particularly good for wisp hunting?
> Any other tips for
> advancing through these rather laborious levels?
> I've tried soloing (which
> is about suicide) and grouping, but it's just slow.
> Lemme know what you
> think and how you made it to lvl 14. Also, any
> money-making tips for this
> strength would be MUCH appreciated =) We all know a
> cleric's life is one of
> perpetual poverty.
>
> Thanks,
>
> Aran'gar
> Right Hand of the Dark
> Tarrew Mar
>
